abilities.name: ATTACK
abilities.description: A standart swing with a weapon, that deals (100%) Physical Damage.

abilities.name: DOUBLE STRIKE
abilities.description: Attack your taget two times, dealing (80%) Physical Damage on each succefful hit.

abilities.name: BRUTAL STRIKE
abilities.description:
Brutally charges the target dealing (150%) Physical Damage.
   Has a 50% Chance to cause Bleed, which deals 10% Physical Damage for 5 rounds.

abilities.name: FIREBALL
abilities.description:
Throw a fireball on an target that deals (180%) Magical Damage.
   FIREBALL also set fire to your target dealing (10%) Magical Damage for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: MANA SHIELD
abilities.description: Surround yourself with mana. Absorbs 3 + (30%) Maximum Mana.
